MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY21 postcode area of Welshpool, affecting properties in Alfred Jones Place, Bronybuckley and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7PM due to urgent repairs to our underground cable network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 9PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.45PM on 17th November 2020
